text: Michael Kindo (20 June 1947 â€“ 31 December 2020) was an Indian field hockey player. He was born in Odisha, India. He represented India in 1972 Summer Olympics and won the bronze medal. He was a member of the team that won the World Cup in 1975. Kindo died on 31 December 2020 at the age of 73.Former Olympic medalist Michael Kindo passes away at the age of 73 ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for India Category:Indian field hockey players
title: Michael Kindo
